domain.name: UMTranslog
domain.documentation:
The UM_Translog domain, adapted from the description in S. Andrews, B. Kettler, K. Erol and J. Hendler. "UM Translog: A Planning Domain for the Development and Benchmarking of Planning Systems." Tech. Report CS_TR_3487, Dept. of Computer Science, University of Maryland, College Park, MD, 1995.
(By Steffen Bucher and Thomas Ruland, SS 2005.)

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: helper_carry_tt
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: ?origin (tcenter, not hub) * ?destination (tcenter, not hub) transport via a hub

methodDeclaration.name: method_helper_move_traincar
methodDeclaration.documentation: send train to pick up car, attach it, deliver it to destination, and detach it

methodDeclaration.name: method_helper_move_traincar_noMoveFirst
methodDeclaration.documentation: attach car, deliver it to destination, and detach it

methodDeclaration.name: method_unload_regular
methodDeclaration.documentation: For unloading a regular vehicle (except an airplane), but that is not covered by the documentation.

methodDeclaration.name: method_load_top_normal
methodDeclaration.documentation: Method for load_top handle Package except Valuable and Hazardous, and start to load then

methodDeclaration.name: method_load_top_hazardous
methodDeclaration.documentation: Method for load_top handle Hazardous and start to load then

methodDeclaration.name: method_load_top_valuable
methodDeclaration.documentation: Method for load_top handle Valuable and start to load then

methodDeclaration.name: method_unload_top_normal
methodDeclaration.documentation: Method for unload_top handle Package except Valuable and Hazardous, and start to unload then

methodDeclaration.name: method_unload_top_hazardous
methodDeclaration.documentation: Method for unload_top handle Hazardous, and start to unload then

methodDeclaration.name: method_unload_top_valuable
methodDeclaration.documentation: Method for unload_top handle Valuable, and start to unload then
